title: Autumn Awakening (and Garden Graveyard!): Preparing for Cool-Season Planting

tasks.task: Performing autumn garden cleanup and plant care.
subtasks: Cutting dead parts of the mint plant.
Checking the health of the mint's new growth.
Preparing the mint for future growth in a new basket.
Trimming dead parts of the strawberry plants.
Removing the eggplant from the garden bed.
Planting carrot seeds in the eggplant bed.
Preparing a pot for a black pepper tree.
Planting beetroot seeds in the garlic chive bed.
Adding piggy soil and mulch to the pepper tree's pot.
Planting the black pepper tree in the prepared pot.
Planting cinnamon basil in a strawberry bed.
Assessing the potential for growing mushrooms in the grow house.
